nodes.text: The Kuat Drive Yards' corporate flagship was a vessel that served KDY's private fleet.

Little is known of the ship, other than its great viewport offered a view behind the vessel itself, unlike those of other KDY-designed warships, like the Imperial-class and other warships fitted with the standard T-shaped command tower.
Kuat of Kuat used this ship as his personal command ship on a mission to bomb the Dune Sea of Tatooine, in an attempt at killing the notorious bounty hunter Boba Fett.
